meta.title: News & Updates
meta.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates from Zapiens.

item1.title: New AI Features Released
item1.excerpt: We're excited to announce the release of our new AI-powered study features, making learning even more personalized and effective.

item2.title: Community Milestone
item2.excerpt: Our learning community has reached 100,000 active users! Join us in celebrating this achievement and continue growing together.

item3.title: New Study Games
item3.excerpt: Introducing our latest collection of educational games designed to make learning more engaging and fun.
